p.a: Due to the school closures for Covid19 Central DeWitt High School and Middle School will be following a Credit/No Credit option as opposed to awarding letter grades for the Spring 2020 semester. Credit can only be given on any assignment/assessmentâ¦

This is the email sent out to students who participated in the Dual Credit Zoom meeting on Friday, April 10. You can watch the meeting and download or access information needed by clicking on the links below. Students and Parents,â¦
